name: Breckon's Cognizance
description:
Jam, Baby, Jam! 2021 Theme: Yeah! I'm Luke Skywalker Description

A short action platformer full of collectibles, shooting and laser sword swooshing!

Controls Game Pad
  • Left Analogue stick - Move.
  • Bottom Face Button - Jump.
  • Right Face Button - Dash.
  • Right Trigger - Blaster.
  • Left Trigger - Saber.
Keyboard
  • Arrow Keys - Move.
  • Space Bar - Jump.
  • Shift Key - Dash.
  • "Z" - Blaster.
  • "X" - Saber.
Credits

Music by Eric Matyas - www.soundimage.org

Note that further updates are coming which I was not able to do in time for the initial Jam deadline.
